Package control

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
control.AppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Appointment controller allows user to interact with an appointment interface. This includes viewing appointments in a table view (either all, by month or by week) and dding appointments or updating and deleting selected appointments.

  • Nested Class Summary

    static interface

    Interface for printing an alert when appointments are overlapping.
    static interface

    Interface for calculating the last day in a week given the current int value.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentController

      public AppointmentController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize function sets up the appointments page with relevant information. Specifically, it sets and fills out the appointments table and combo boxes. In addition, it incorporates a listener for the user selecting different appointments in table. This listener fills out all field boxes below the table.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - initialize url
      resourceBundle - initialize resource bundle

    • execute

      public void execute(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Execute allows the user to add, update or delete an appointment. The execute button changes its name depending on which tab is selected ("Add", "Update, or "Delete"). When the "Add" button is pressed, it adds an appointment to the database and updates the table. When the "Update" button is pressed, it updates the currently selected appointment and updates the table. When the "Delete" button is pressed, it deletes the currently selected appointment and displays a message with the appointment id and type. A Lambda expression is incorporated to print out an error message when appointments are found to be overlapping This function is used multiple times, so helps with repetition within the code.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - clicking the execute button (Add, Update or Delete)
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • cancel

      public void cancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Cancel brings the user back to the main navigational page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - clicking the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException - exception in case of input/output error

    • addTabClicked

      public void addTabClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
      addTabClicked function changes the interface for adding appointments. It changes the label of the execute button to say "Add", enables all fields except for the appointment id, and clears all fields so the user can easily input an appointment to add.
      Parameters:
      event - selecting the "Add" tab

    • updateTabClicked

      public void updateTabClicked(javafx.event.Event event) throws SQLException
      updateTabClicked function changes the interface for updating appointments. It changes the label of the execute button to say "Update", enables all fields except for the appointment id, anc fills all fields with the selected appointment information.
      Parameters:
      event - selecting the "Update" tab
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • deleteTabClicked

      public void deleteTabClicked(javafx.event.Event event) throws SQLException
      deleteTabClicked function changes the interface for deleting appointments. It changes the label of the execute button to say "Delete", disables all fields, and fills all fields with the selected appointment information.
      Parameters:
      event - selecting the "Delete" tab
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • allRadioPressed

      public void allRadioPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      The all radio button function changes the appointment table to show all appointments.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - selecting the "All" radio button
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • weekRadioPressed

      public void weekRadioPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      The Week radio button changes the appointment table to show all appointments within the current week. The current week is from Sunday to Saturday.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - selecting the "Week" radio button
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • monthRadioPressed

      public void monthRadioPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      The Month radio button changes the appointment table to show all appointments within the current month.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - selecting the "Month" radio button
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • setAppointments

      public void setAppointments() throws SQLException
      The setAppointments function sets the appointments table to either show all appointments, all appointments in current week or all appointments in current month. This depends on whether the "All", "Month", or "Week" radio buttons are selected. The current week is set as Sunday to Saturday. This function is called within all radio buttons and whenever the table needs to be updated. A lambda expression is incorporated to calculate the last day of the week given the current day's int value. The current days input int value is 1 to 7 for Monday to Sunday and The last day of the week output int value is 1 to 7 for Sunday to Saturday. This method helps decrease the amount of times the equation is written out, decreasing programmer error.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • clearAppointments

      public void clearAppointments()
      The clearAppointments function clears all input fields including text boxes, combo boxes and date pickers for the appointments.

    • fillAppointments

      public void fillAppointments() throws SQLException
      The fillAppointments function fills all input fields including text boxes, combo boxes and date pickers for the selected appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • disabledOrEnabled

      public void disabledOrEnabled(Boolean value)
      The disableOrEnable function sets all input fields (except the appointment id) as enabled if the input is false, and disabled if the input is true.
      Parameters:
      value - the input of true or false

    • overlapTest

      public boolean overlapTest(LocalDate date, LocalTime start, LocalTime end) throws SQLException
      The overlapTest function checks if there is an overlap with appointments. It returns true if the inputted appointment times coincide with any other existing appointments. This is an overloaded function.
      Parameters:
      date - date (LocalDate) user is trying to use for adding or updating an appointment
      start - start (LocalTime) time user is trying to use for adding or updating an appointment
      end - end (LocalTime) time user is trying to use for adding or updating an appointment
      Returns:
      true or false - true if there is an overlap and false if there isn't
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • overlapTest

      public boolean overlapTest(LocalDate date, LocalTime start, LocalTime end, Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      The overlapTest function checks if there is an overlap with appointments. It returns true if the inputted appointment times coincide with any other existing appointments. This is an overloaded function.
      Parameters:
      date - date (LocalDate) user is trying to use for adding or updating an appointment
      start - start (LocalTime) time user is trying to use for adding or updating an appointment
      end - end (LocalTime) time user is trying to use for adding or updating an appointment
      appointment - the currently selected appointment
      Returns:
      true or false - true if there is an overlap and false if there isn't
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error
